content: I'm looking for proof assistant/dependent types/fp people to follow on twitter, does anyone have any suggestions? if you tweet about these things please include yourself!

Iâ€™m not a twitter person, but I know of some accounts. (You will have to Google for the handles and double check my spelling.)

  • Andrej Bauer

  • Xena Project (Kevin Buzzard)
    Also here are some machine learning for theorem proving folks depending on your interests:

Sebastian is on twitter as well: derKha
